# Twitter Clone - Next.js + Supabase

## Project Overview
- **Stack**: Next.js 14 (App Router), TypeScript, Supabase, TailwindCSS
- **Features**: Authentication, Posts, Likes, Retweets, Comments, Follow System, Timeline

## Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Scaffold Next.js project with TypeScript
- [ ] Configure Supabase integration
- [ ] Create database schema and types
- [ ] Build authentication system
- [ ] Create main components (Tweet, Feed, Profile)
- [ ] Install dependencies and compile
- [ ] Create comprehensive README

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow Next.js 14 App Router conventions
- Use Supabase for backend (auth, database, storage)
- Style with TailwindCSS
- Keep components modular and reusable
